pkgmetadata.longdescription: Python driver for ArangoDB--------------------------Driver for **ArangoDB REST API** inrerface, `arangodb.org <http://arangodb.org>`_.. image:: https://travis-ci.org/joymax/arango-python.png?branch=masterInstallation************:: pip install arangoUsage*****To start work with **ArangoDB** try following example:: from arango import create # create connection to database conn = create(db="test") conn.database.create() # create collection with name `test_collection` conn.test_collection.create() # create document conn.test_collection.documents.create({"sample_key": "sample_value"}) # get first document doc = conn.test_collection.documents().first # get document body doc.body # get all documents in collection for doc in conn.test_collection.query.execute(): print doc.idFor more details please read `Documentation <http://arangodb-python-driver.readthedocs.org/en/latest/>`_Supported Python interpreters and versions: - cPython 3.3 - cPython 2.7 - PyPy 1.9Supported **ArangoDB versions**: *1.4x*Developed by `Maksym Klymyshyn <http://ua.linkedin.com/in/klymyshyn>`_Changelog*********0.2.0~~~~~~ * Added support for multiple databases0.1.8~~~~~~ * Added support of **bulk inserts**
